医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
印度过早绝经：触发因素是什么？ 《科学报告》上发表的一项研究根据 2019-2021 年全国家庭健康调查探讨了印度过早和提前绝经的诱因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Premature-and-early-menopause-in-India-what-are-the-triggers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Premature-and-early-menopause-in-India-what-are-the-triggers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87798de8-779a-4e74-9caa-e173f33a84ae Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:59:00 -0500 Premature and early menopause in India: what are the triggers?
英国 ELRIG 宣布 Steve Bates 和 Anderson Ryan 博士担任 2024 年研究与创新大会的主讲人英国欧洲实验室研究与创新小组 (ELRIG) 今天公布了即将于 3 月 20 日至 21 日在曼彻斯特大学举行的研究与创新会议的主讲嘉宾。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/ELRIG-UK-announces-Steve-Bates-and-Dr-Anderson-Ryan-as-keynote-speakers-at-Research-and-Innovation-2024。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/ELRIG-UK-announces-Steve-Bates-and-Dr-Anderson-Ryan-as-keynote-speakers-at-Research-and-Innovation-2024。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=288081aa-c793-4c61-b3f1-a858b8098e4f Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:46:00 -0500 ELRIG UK announces Steve Bates and Dr Anderson Ryan as keynote speakers at Research and Innovation 2024
新研究将豆类消费与降低结直肠癌风险联系起来研究人员整理并分析了 12 项研究，其中包括超过 17 年的病例对照实验，旨在阐明食用豆类对特定部位癌症的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-study-links-legume-conspiration-to-lower-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-study-links-legume-conspiration-to-lower-risk-of-colorectal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1827aab9-5c8c-4b81-83e9-209523bd962c Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:38:00 -0500 New study links legume consumption to lower risk of colorectal cancer
莫纳什大学领导的研究揭示了狼疮的潜在长期治疗方法研究人员通过设计和测试针对系统性红斑狼疮 (SLE) 治疗的表位靶向 Tregs，评估了 Smith (Sm) 特异性调节性 T 细胞 (Treg) 在阻止狼疮性肾炎 (LN) 方面的功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Monash-led-study-unveils-potential-long-term-treatment-for-lupus.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Monash-led-study-unveils-pottial-long-term-treatment-for-lupus.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=775c6e50-bc99-420b-8913-820cbd8387b1 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:15:00 -0500 Monash-led study unveils potential long-term treatment for lupus
FDA 禁止使用直发化学物质的计划被称为太少、太晚今年四月，在联邦机构将甲醛列为人类致癌物十几年后，美国食品和药物管理局暂定公布一项提案，考虑禁止在直发产品中使用这种化学物质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/FDAe28099s-plan-to-ban-hair-relaxer-chemical-known-too-little-too-late.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/FDAe28099s-plan-to-ban-hair-relaxer-chemical-known-too-little-too-late.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66d8d8e8-9fd9-4315-a41b-f9866ddc2065 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:10:47 -0500 FDA’s plan to ban hair relaxer chemical called too little, too late
城市知道警察应对精神危机电话的方式需要改变。但如何呢？当 911 无线电调度接到电话时，费城警察肯尼思·哈珀 (Kenneth Harper) 和詹妮弗·托雷斯 (Jennifer Torres) 正坐在巡逻车里等红灯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Cities-know-the-way-police-respond-to-mental-crisis-calls-needs-to-change-But-how.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Cities-know-the-way-police-respond-to-mental-crisis-calls-needs-to-change-But-how.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b135576f-4cec-4614-ba33-2028ddde426c Thu, 08 Feb 2024 06:09:20 -0500 Cities know the way police respond to mental crisis calls needs to change. But how?
探索养狗和儿童活动水平之间的动态研究人员利用儿童体力活动游戏空间和环境 (PLAYCE) 队列研究的数据，研究了养狗情况的变化对儿童体力活动和运动行为的纵向影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Exploring-the-dynamic- Between-dog-ownership-and-child-activity-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Exploring-the-dynamic- Between-dog-ownership-and-child-activity-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be4096ec-0b30-4365-8736-ed0b4410de90 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 05:51:00 -0500 Exploring the dynamic between dog ownership and child activity levels
研究表明青少年抑郁症可能有从子宫开始的特定途径研究人员调查了产前母体炎症（PNMI）与青春期后代抑郁症状之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-suggests-there-may-be-specific-pathways-to-adolescent-depression-that-begin-in-the-womb.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-suggests-there-may-be-specific-pathways-to-adolescent-depression-that-begin-in-the-womb.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12b09e66-a46e-4801-a3b2-573ee8b5906b Thu, 08 Feb 2024 05:23:00 -0500 Study suggests there may be specific pathways to adolescent depression that begin in the womb
研究探索传统大西洋饮食作为饮食相关疾病和环境可持续性的潜在解决方案来自西班牙的研究人员调查了传统大西洋饮食对健康和环境的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-explores-traditional-Atlantic-diets-as-a-pottial-solution-for-diet-lated-diseases-and-environmental-sustainability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Study-explores-traditional-Atlantic-diets-as-a-pottial-solution-for-diet-lated-diseases-and-environmental-sustainability.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc3c4d35-463c-429d-9127-91c11e0c2e68 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 05:06:00 -0500 Study explores traditional Atlantic diets as a potential solution for diet-related diseases and environmental sustainability
研究发现肠道健康是对抗皮肤病的关键，眼睛益生菌是潜在的治疗方法研究人员回顾了肠道微生物群失调对皮肤病的重大影响，表明益生菌可以提供新的治疗途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-finds-gut-health-key-to-combating-skin-diseases-eyes-probiotics-as-pottial-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240207/Study-finds-gut-health-key-to-combating-skin-diseases-eyes-probiotics-as-pottial-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5f3afc3-5b11-45e6-8a3f-f5ac5384f3f5 Wed, 07 Feb 2024 23:49:00 -0500 Study finds gut health key to combating skin diseases, eyes probiotics as potential treatment
